p: Recent studies showed that the stabilization of non-native Protein-Protein Interactions (PPIs) between these N terminal domains (NTD) in MERS coronavirus is a valid strategy to halt viral replication (Amin & Jha, 2020; Ghosh et al., 2020; Lin et al., 2020). However, to date no study has evaluated the applicability of exploiting this mechanism of action against COVID-19.
